message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $15000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I believe I can provide a fair price for your product. My counteroffer is $14000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my initial price. I'm willing to come down to $14500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can agree on this.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. My counteroffer is now $14200.
